editor.name: Node name
editor.FDSKey: Unique Key of the data source
editor.tip-cnctRetryInterval: Retry interval in minutes for CCS connection error.Use 0 for no-retry.
editor.tip-tappingInterval: Tapping CCS interval in hours to check connection using getStatus request.Use 0 for no-retry.
